pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Group-Regularized Logistic Elastic Net Regression // Allows the user to incorporate multiple sources of co-data (e.g., previously obtained p-values, published gene lists, and annotation) in the estimation of a logistic regression model to enhance predictive performance and feature selection, as described in Mnch, Peeters, van der Vaart, and van de Wiel (2018) arXiv:1805.00389.
